util
Class Point2D

java.lang.Object
  util.Point2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Point2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The Point class encapsulates a single point in a TiledRoom containing the X and Y coordinate, along with the Layer.

See Also:
Serialized Form

The Point class encapsulates a single point in a TiledRoom containing the X and Y coordinate, along with the Layer.

equals

public boolean equals(Point2D p)
Matches itself to the given Point2D. If all 3 coordinates match (x, y, layer) the method returns true, otherwise false.

Parameters:
p - - The outside Point2D to be matched.
Returns:
- true if all 2 coordinates match (x, y, layer), false if otherwise.

scale

public Point2D scale(int multiple)
Scales the X and Y coordinates of the Point2D. Does NOT scale the layer.

Parameters:
multiple - - The number that the X and Y coordinate are to be multiplied by.
Returns:
A Point2D with scaled X and Y.
